conbody.p: The Top Customers panel identifies the customers with the largest storage capacities (in petabytes). The storage capacity excludes systems which do not upload telemetry data.
The graphic also indicates the used storage capacity. By default, the top ten customers are shown and this top ten is used in all other charts on the Install Base dashboard.
To display all customers in one graphic, click All. This opens a pop-up window with an identical graphic including all customers. Use the horizontal scroll bar to scroll through the graphic.
